name: Passage: A Job Interview Simulator!
description:
Since we are in Early Access, we will be updating the game regularly, and improving it as we go. All changes should be very minor once Early Access is over. The game is basically 99% complete right now in its current state! Currently, all 5 chapters are playable, but we are porting the game to a new engine, so the UI/UX will change, along with some minor things like character and background animations. The Linux version is also currently limited to the first 3 chapters. We hope to leave Early Access as soon as possible (1-3 months).

Made in Michigan.
